1.2.name: wordpress/wp-popular-posts
1.2.description:
EN: The widget will show the most popular on your blog, basing on the number of comments to the recordings. RU: Виджет покажет популярные записи вашего блога, основываясь на количестве комментариев к записям.

Features:

  • configurable number of displayed records;
  • conclusion quote, or just the title;
  • display in a list or any other form (the tags are set);
  • you can set the display of posts from only certain categories;
  • you can specify whether or not the number of comments.
